::Prowl::

A huge laser bolt flies under Prowl, nearly blowing his legs off but 
missing. He looks over at the source of it and groans once he sees 
Menasor. That was the first non-Alliance enemy gestalt he'd seen, and 
he'd rather not have seen it at all.

Prowl continues to fly up, not wanting to be hit by any of the 
gestalt's shots. He knew that his missiles would do little against 
the gestalt, so he didn't fire.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Wildrider followed Dead-End up towards Motormaster.
> 
> Speedbreaker had to work hard to pull himself up, then he noticed 
his
> comerades, and jumped up soaring to where they were.
> 
> "Hha ha ha haha h, the kid gloves are off maximal" screamed 
Wildrider, the
> voice eminating from what was left of his head. "Stunticons, MERGE" 
Yelled
> Motormaster in a commanding tone. With that he flew forwards, and 
the rest
> followed him.
> 
> In a circling and complex transformation, Motormaster compacted, and
> enlarged a bit, forming a large piece of black metal, with stubs on 
the
> ends. Wildrider and Speedbreaker both transformed into car modes, 
and then
> transformed again, gaining feet, and hooking up to Motormaster. 
Drag Strip,
> and Dead-End both also transformed into car modes, and then 
transformed
> into large arms, joining to Motormaster as well. The large body 
that had
> been formed twirled around, and then after a large eminating light,
> transformed, a huge head with horns, and a vacant fave emerged from 
the
> top, as well as armor Transforming all around.
> 
> The huge monster of a robot stoped and soared , standing upright, 
and
> hovering in mid air. He was huge, and an awesome form, 45 feet of 
robot
> hovering above the battle field, staring at the combatants on the 
ground.
> "MENASOR" he pronounced his name.
> 
> He looked around for a target, and noticed Hot Rod, then looked 
some more
> and noticed Prow. "MENASOR.....CRUSH" he said in a deep booming 
voice that
> could be heard from all around. He raised his arms, and huge barrels
> underneath were present. He aimed one arm at Prowl, and the other 
at Hot
> Rod, and Fired, leting huge Plasma energy erupting from both 
towards the
> targets, from the air like raining fire.
